```julia
function fib(n::Integer)                                                                                                    
    fibs = [0,1]                                                                                                            
    for i in 3:n                                                                                                                
        push!(fibs, mod(fibs[end-1] + fibs[end], 10))                                                                       
    end                                                                                                                     
    return fibs[end]                                                                                                    
end   
```
